name: Escape VR: The Cabin
description:
You find yourself in a small cabin and it seems that you're being watched. You have no recolection of what has happened. All you know is that you must escape.

Escape VR: The Cabin is a short VR escape room experience. This is currently only a proof of concept with hopefully more stuff and rooms to come.

If you experience any bugs, please let me know.

Tested on

  • Oculus/Meta Quest 2

If you have tried this game on any other headset, please let me know.
